entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
